Additional notes
Formerly known under the name "Granite Heart".

Interesting side note, original drummer Hasche began to manage the German rock club "Rockfabrik Ludwigsburg". Band name taken from a certain song by Judas Priest.

Gerald "Preacher" Warnecke is now vicar at an AIDS-advice bureau in Cologne.
